00025 // required file
00026 require '../sysconfig.inc.php';
00027 // start the session
00028 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session.inc.php';
00029 // session checking
00030 require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'admin/default/session_check.inc.php';
00031 require SIMBIO_BASE_DIR.'simbio_GUI/template_parser/simbio_template_parser.inc.php';
00032 require LIB_DIR.'module.inc.php';
00033 
00034 // https connection (if enabled)
00035 if ($sysconf['https_enable']) {
00036     simbio_security::doCheckHttps($sysconf['https_port']);
00037 }
00038 
00039 // create the template object
00040 $template = new simbio_template_parser($sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['theme'].'/index_template.html');
00041 // page title
00042 $page_title = $sysconf['library_name'].' :: Library Automation System';
00043 // main menu
00044 $module = new module();
00045 $module->setModulesDir(MODULES_BASE_DIR);
00046 $main_menu = $module->generateModuleMenu($dbs);
00047 
00048 $current_module = '';
00049 // get module from URL
00050 if (isset($_GET['mod']) AND !empty($_GET['mod'])) {
00051     $current_module = trim($_GET['mod']);
00052 }
00053 // read privileges
00054 $can_read = utility::havePrivilege($current_module, 'r');
00055 
00056 // submenu
00057 $sub_menu = $module->generateSubMenu(($current_module AND $can_read)?$current_module:'');
00058 
00059 // start the output buffering for main content
00060 ob_start();
00061 // info
00062 $info = __('Welcome To The Library Automation System, you are currently logged in as').' <strong>'.$_SESSION['realname'].'</strong>'; //mfc
00063 // set some javascript vars
00064 echo '<script type="text/javascript">';
00065 echo 'lastStr = \''.addslashes($info).'\';';
00066 if ($current_module) {
00067     echo 'defaultAJAXurl = \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.$current_module.'/index.php\';';
00068 } else {
00069     echo 'defaultAJAXurl = \''.SENAYAN_WEB_ROOT_DIR.'admin/default/home.php\';';
00070 }
00071 echo '</script>';
00072 
00073 if ($current_module AND $can_read) {
00074     // get content of module default content with AJAX
00075     echo '<script type="text/javascript">setContent(\'mainContent\', \''.MODULES_WEB_ROOT_DIR.$current_module.'/index.php\', \'post\');</script>';
00076 } else {
00077     include 'default/home.php';
00078 }
00079 // page content
00080 $main_content = ob_get_clean();
00081 
00082 // assign content to markers
00083 $template->assign('<!--PAGE_TITLE-->', $page_title);
00084 $template->assign('<!--CSS-->', $sysconf['admin_template']['css']);
00085 $template->assign('<!--MAIN_MENU-->', $main_menu);
00086 $template->assign('<!--SUB_MENU-->', $sub_menu);
00087 $template->assign('<!--INFO-->', $info);
00088 $template->assign('<!--LIBRARY_NAME-->', $sysconf['library_name']);
00089 $template->assign('<!--LIBRARY_SUBNAME-->', $sysconf['library_subname']);
00090 $template->assign('<!--MAIN_CONTENT-->', $main_content);
00091 $template->assign('<!--FOOTER-->', $sysconf['page_footer']);
00092 
00093 // print out the template
00094 $template->printOut();
00095 ?>
